Platform.Title: M1, M3, M18 GAS Array
Platform.Description: oligonucleotide array containing unique ORFs rom M1, M3 and M18 Streptococcus pyogenes

Column.Name: ORF
Column.Description: Spy Number; Comparable ORF# from Oklahoma Sequencing Project

Column.Name: SEQUENCE
Column.Description: Oligo sequence 5'-3' of probe spotted onto arrays

Column.Name: ORF length
Column.Description: full-length of ORF within genome

Column.Name: 5'end from ORF start
Column.Description: # of bp between 5' ORF and 5' probe

Column.Name: 3'end from ORF start
Column.Description: # of bp between 5' ORF and 3' probe

Column.Name: Bases from 3'end
Column.Description: # of bp between 5' probe and 3' ORF

Column.Name: Tm
Column.Description: melting temperature of probe

Column.Name: GC
Column.Description: % GC content of probe

Column.Name: M1 Cross hybrid. identity
Column.Description: next closest identity within genome of probe

Column.Name: M1 contiguous bases common to another sequence
Column.Description: # of bp within probe that are contiguous to another sequence within M1 genome

Column.Name: M3 Cross hybrid. identity
Column.Description: % identity of probe to M3 genome

Column.Name: M3 contiguous bases common to another sequence
Column.Description: # of bp within probe that are contiguous to another sequence within M3 genome

Column.Name: M18 Cross hybrid. identity
Column.Description: % identity of probe to M18 genome

Column.Name: M18 contiguous bases common to another sequence
Column.Description: # of bp within probe that are contiguous to another sequence within M18 genome

Sample.Title: JRS4 #9421

Channel.Source: CsCl2 total RNA from M6 serotype GAS JRS4
Channel.Label: Cy3

Channel.Source: Pooled CsCl2 total RNA from M6 serotype GAS JRS4 and isogenic covR mutant JRS948
Channel.Characteristics: A, B, C, D for each strain
Channel.Label: Cy5

Sample.Description: Total RNA was isolated by CsCl2 method and labeled cDNA was generated using the Fairplay microarray labelling kit from Stratagene using random hexamers. Labeled cDNA was purified using QiaQuick PCR purification columns from Qiagen and concentrated using Microcon YM30 columns from Amicon. The amount of incorporated label was determined by measuring the absorbance at 550nm (Cy3) or 650nm (Cy5). 60 pmol each of Cy-dye (reference cDNA (Cy5) and test cDNA (Cy3)) were combined in 60 ml hybridization buffer 1 (Ambion), denatured and hybridized to the array at 42Â°C for at least 16 h, followed by subsequent washes. Output data (F635 mean-B635, F532 mean-B532, flags) was filtered to set any spots that did not exceed 2SD above a background threshold to the threshold value to avoid spurious expression ratios. Remaining spots were averaged, filtered to remove genes not present in JRS4 (the strain examined) and normalized before statistical analysis.
Sample.Data-Processing: glabal normalization after removing genes not present in JRS4

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: same as UNF_VALUE but with flagged values removed

Column.Name: Non-Log Ratio
Column.Description: ratio of 532/635 after genomic normalization

Column.Name: F635 Mean - B635
Column.Description: original data from gpr file of the mean of the 635 feature - background 635

Column.Name: F532 Mean - B532
Column.Description: original data from gpr file of the mean of the 532 feature - background 532

Column.Name: Flags
Column.Description: original data from gpr file, flag data about each spot

Column.Name: UNF_VALUE
Column.Description: log ratio of 532/635 after genomic normalization

Column.Name: Non-Log Ratio
Column.Description: ratio of 532/635 after genomic normalization

Column.Name: F635 Mean - B635
Column.Description: original data from gpr file of the mean of the 635 feature - background 635

Column.Name: F532 Mean - B532
Column.Description: original data from gpr file of the mean of the 532 feature - background 532

Column.Name: Flags
Column.Description: original data from gpr file, flag data about each spot

Column.Name: UNF_VALUE
Column.Description: log ratio of 532/635 after genomic normalization

Column.Name: F532 Mean - B532
Column.Description: original data from gpr file of the mean of the 532 feature - background 532

Column.Name: Flags
Column.Description: original data from gpr file, flag data about each spot

Column.Name: UNF_VALUE
Column.Description: log ratio of 532/635 after genomic normalization

Sample.Title: JRS948 #9438

Channel.Source: CsCl2 total RNA from M6 serotype GAS JRS948
Channel.Label: Cy3

Channel.Source: Pooled CsCl2 total RNA from M6 serotype GAS JRS4 and isogenic covR mutant JRS948
Channel.Characteristics: JRS4, JRS948 RNA preps: A, B, C, D for each strain
Channel.Label: Cy5

Sample.Description: Total RNA was isolated by CsCl2 method and labeled cDNA was generated using the Fairplay microarray labelling kit from Stratagene using random hexamers. Labeled cDNA was purified using QiaQuick PCR purification columns from Qiagen and concentrated using Microcon YM30 columns from Amicon. The amount of incorporated label was determined by measuring the absorbance at 550nm (Cy3) or 650nm (Cy5). 60 pmol each of Cy-dye (reference cDNA (Cy5) and test cDNA (Cy3)) were combined in 60 ml hybridization buffer 1 (Ambion), denatured and hybridized to the array at 42Â°C for at least 16 h, followed by subsequent washes. Output data (F635 mean-B635, F532 mean-B532, flags) was filtered to set any spots that did not exceed 2SD above a background threshold to the threshold value to avoid spurious expression ratios. Remaining spots were averaged, filtered to remove genes not present in JRS4 (the strain examined) and normalized before statistical analysis.
Sample.Data-Processing: glabal normalization after removing genes not present in JRS4

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: same as UNF_VALUE but with flagged values removed

Column.Name: Non-Log Ratio
Column.Description: ratio of 532/635 after genomic normalization

Column.Name: F635 Mean - B635
Column.Description: original data from gpr file of the mean of the 635 feature - background 635

Column.Name: F532 Mean - B532
Column.Description: original data from gpr file of the mean of the 532 feature - background 532

Column.Name: Flags
Column.Description: original data from gpr file, flag data about each spot

Column.Name: UNF_VALUE
Column.Description: log ratio of 532/635 after genomic normalization

Series.Title: GAS M6 serotype, wild-type vs covR mutant
Series.Summary: JRS4 is our wild-type M6 serotype strain and JRS948 is the isogenic covR strain. Keywords: 2-channel
Series.Overall-Design: Four separate RNA preparations from each strain (RNA #A-D) were hybridized to duplicate arrays. Reference RNA consisted of pooled RNA from each preparation, labelled with Cy5.
